com.cube.storm.content.lib.parser

Class BundleBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.content.lib.parser.BundleBuilder

  • public abstract class BundleBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Gson processor used to build models in the content such as manifest.json

    Access this class via ContentSettings.getBundleBuilder(). Do not instantiate this class directly

    Author:
    Callum Taylor
